title: BRIEF-Alvopetro Announces $15 Mln Credit Facility
text:
BRIEF-Alvopetro Announces $15 Mln Credit Facility

Stock Markets 9 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 07:51)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Alvopetro Announces $15 Mln Credit Facility Sept 23 (Reuters) - Alvopetro Energy Ltd : * ALVOPETRO ANNOUNCES US$15 MILLION CREDIT FACILITY * ALVOPETRO ENERGY LTD - ALVOPETRO IS ISSUING 8.4 MILLION SHARE PURCHASE WARRANTS TO CORDIANT AND CO'S FINANCIAL ADVISERS * ALVOPETRO ENERGY LTD - ANNOUNCES THAT CO HAS ENTERED INTO A $15 MILLION CREDIT AGREEMENT WITH CORDIANT CAPITAL INC & ITS AFFILIATES * ALVOPETRO ENERGY LTD - FACILITY MATURES THREE YEARS FROM FIRST FUNDING DATE AND BEARS CASH INTEREST AT A RATE OF 9.5% PER ANNUM, PAYABLE MONTHLY * ALVOPETRO ENERGY - EACH WARRANT ENTITLES HOLDER TO PURCHASE ONE COMMON SHARE OF CO, AT AN EXERCISE PRICE OF $0.60 PER COMMON SHARE * ALVOPETRO ENERGY LTD - WARRANTS EXPIRE ON SEPTEMBER 20, 2022
